mapper.select: select * FROM ORDERALL WHERE yy_date between to_char(sysdate + 2, 'yyyymmdd') and to_char(sysdate + 7, 'yyyymmdd') ORDER BY yy_date, yy_time
mapper.update: UPDATE orderall set num = (num-1) WHERE yy_date = #{yy_date} AND yy_time = #{yy_time}
mapper.insert: insert into orderinfo(id, yy_date, yy_time, yxbz) values (#{id}, to_char(#{yy_date}), to_char(#{yy_time}), '1')
